page.title: 06SOCIAL LIFE _ MEN
page.content: For the boys and men there are junior and senior football teams,which play on the pitch at the Inn. There is a darts club. Clay pigeon shoots are held in the field beside the Inn and competions are held throughout the year. Some men go out shooting wild duck and hares: others go hill walking and climbing. A young boy of 12 has about 45 Munros (peaks over 3000 ft ) to his credit and his father has conquered about 153. A few are members of the Lonach Society whose centre is in Strathdon 12 miles up the glen. The Lonach Gathering and Games ,held every year in Strathdon are the oldest in Scotland. Social events held throughout the year raise funds for all these groups.One highlight of the year is the vintage car rally which takes place in June. Discos are held at the Inn for young people.
